name: Terraco Group
description: Terraco is a global leader in the formulation, design and production of environmentally friendly finishing materials for the construction industry. Terraco specialises in External Wall Insulation (EWI) which is marketed under its leading brand Terraco EIFS. External wall insulation is the ideal solution for making a building more energy efficient and works equally well on new build as well as refurbishment. Please visit our website for further information www.terraco.co.uk.
